```{bash}
source ~/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh
conda activate qiime2
# fastq-dump -I -O ../temp ../data/SRR4038961.1

# split all file
ls ../data/SRR* | \
  xargs -n 1 -P 1 bash -c \
  'fastq-dump -I -O ../temp $0'
```
